Hi,

I am using heritrix 2.0.0 and I was unable to add the Quota Enforcer
t=
o the map of Processors. I got an error message because I could not
properl=
y initialize the Quota Enforcer, as there was no constructor
without parame=
ter. 
The existing constructor took a CrawlController as parameter, without=

ever using this in the Quota Enforcer. Adding a constructor without
parame=
ter (like following) solved the issue and made it possible to
use the Quota=
 Enforcer in the map of processors.

    /**
     * Constructor.
     */
  =
  public QuotaEnforcer() {
        super();
    } 


I have added this to t=
he jira issue tracker.

best,
Nathalie
